itunes:title: The Presence of God Week 1 with Jessica Lamb
title: The Presence of God Week 1 with Jessica Lamb
description:
For the first week of our series on the Presence of God, Raechel and Amanda talk with SRT Editorial Director, Jessica Lamb, about the awe-inspiring reality that God pursues us and invites us into His presence. The three friends lay the foundation for this four-week study by defining key aspects of God’s presence, while also discussing nighttime basketball and disclosing who can still do a cartwheel. Wherever the conversation goes, it always comes back to this: God’s presence permeates our daily lives and the world around us.


Read with Us: 

This episode corresponds to Week 1 of the She Reads Truth The Presence of God reading plan found on the She Reads Truth app and SheReadsTruth.com. 


Shop the Presence of God Reading Plan collection at ShopSheReadsTruth.com. 


Show notes can be found at shereadstruth.com/podcast/the-presence-of-god-week-1-with-jessica-lamb/
